Cortez "Corky" McCoy bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise si Los Angeles
A maara ya màkà ihe osise ya nke ndị Afrịka-Amerịka bi n'ọbọdọ ukwu na mkpuchi album Miles Davis.
Ozi gbásárá ndụ McCoy tupu ya ezute Miles Davis dị ụkọ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe mgbè ọ zutere Davis
Ha abụọ ghọrọ ezigbo ndị enyi, Davis na McCoy nwekọrọ ụlọ na New York City na West 77th Street.
McCoy mepụtara ihe osise mkpuchi màkà abọm Davis On the Corner (1972), In Concert: Live at Philharmonic Hall (1973), Big Fun (1974), na Water Babies (1976)
E mepụtara ihe osise màkà mkpuchi nke On the Corner na nkwali Davis
Ọ na-echegbu onwé ya na egwu ya eruteghị ndị na-ege ntị Africa-America, ọ chọkwara ka McCoy mepụta ihe ha ga-emetụta
Mmeghachi omume sitere na Columbia Records mgbè ha hụrụ nsonaazụ ahụ abụghị ihe dị mma
Davis siri ọnwụ na iji ihe osise McCoy
Davis chetara n'ụdị ajụjụ ọnụ ya:
Davis gbalịrị ịnye ndị na-ese ihe nkírí Europe abụọ dị iche iche ọrụ iji mepụta ihe osise mkpuchi màkà abọm ya Rubberband n'oge afọ 1980
O nweghị afọ ojuju na nsonaazụ ya, a tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ n'ikpeazụ.
N'afọ 2007, Columbia wepụtara igbe 6-CD The Complete On the Corner Sessions nke gụnyere ihe osise ọhụrụ nke Corky McCoy.
McCoy mepụtara ihe osise mkpuchi màkà abọm Fresh Mode, nkè otu hip-hop Ugly Duckling wepụtara, na 1999, yana egwu abụọ a wepụtara na nkwalite nke LP.
McCoy mepụtara ihe osise màkà akwụkwọ 2000 nke ónyé na-eme ihe ọchị Tim Meadows bụ The Ladies Man: Sexin' and Lovin' Leon Phelps Style, nke ya na Andrew Steele na Dennis McNicholas dere
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ n'ihe gbasara ihe nkiri Tim Meadows The Ladies Man nke gosipụtara otu ónyé nwere otu ihe mara mma nke 1970s nke jikọtara ya na mkpuchi album McCoy màkà Davis.
